Package metrocs.redistricting

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • metrocs.redistricting.Renderer
  • public final class Renderer
extends Object
    Utility class for rendering regions and districts.

    Basic versions use ASCII text graphics.

    Enhanced versions use Java graphical interfaces.

    ASCII rendering retrieves specific affiliation display character from the Party object itself. Arbitrary content is shown using '*'.

    Version:
    20211223.0
    Author:
    Dr. Jody Paul

    • Method Detail

      • renderAsASCII

        public static String renderAsASCII​(boolean showAffiliation,
                                   Region region)
        Renders a region as an ASCII-graphic string. The region is depicted as cells within a rectangular grid, with cells corresponding to locations in the region shown filled. The origin is in the upper left corner.
        Parameters:
        showAffiliation - true to show party affiliation; false otherwise
        region - the region to be rendered
        Returns:
        the rendering of the given region

      • renderAsASCII

        public static String renderAsASCII​(Region region)
        Renders a region as an ASCII-graphic string. Convenience method equivalent to renderAsASCII(false, region).
        Parameters:
        region - the region to be rendered
        Returns:
        the rendering of the given region

      • renderAsASCII

        public static String renderAsASCII​(boolean showAffiliation,
                                   Region region,
                                   Set<District> districts)
        Renders a region and its districts as an ASCII-graphic string. The origin is in the upper left corner.
        Parameters:
        showAffiliation - true to show party affiliation; false otherwise
        region - the region to be rendered
        districts - the districts within the region
        Returns:
        the rendering of the given region showing districts

      • renderAsASCII

        public static String renderAsASCII​(Region region,
                                   Set<District> districts)
        Renders a region and its districts as an ASCII-graphic string. Convenience method equivalent to renderAsASCII(false, region, districts).
        Parameters:
        region - the region to be rendered
        districts - the districts within the region
        Returns:
        the rendering of the given region showing districts
